item.title: Caroline add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Kiss me, and you will see how important I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad. Or I can go mad by ricocheting in between." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Eunice Kennedy Shriver
item.description: "Do it well, finish it properly, and move on." -- Eunice Kennedy Shriver

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "We owe our children – the most vulnerable citizens in any society – a life free from violence and fear." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Bill Shapiro
item.description:
"I hate feeling so weak and vulnerable.
I hate that I miss him.
I hate that I am alone, and I always was.
I hate that I made him into a superhero, he was not.
I hate that he doesn't want to kiss me.
I hate that every time I cry over one boy it's like crying over all of them again." -- Bill Shapiro

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "... and the very folds of the curtains contained secrets and sighs." -- Anaïs Nin
